Strompris API¶

Fetches data from https://www.hvakosterstrommen.no/strompris-api and visualize it.

Assignment 5

strompris.fetch_day_prices(date: date | None = None, location: str = 'NO1') → DataFrame¶

Fetch one day of data for one location from hvakosterstrommen.no API

Args:

date: The date you want fetched location: The location you want fetched

Returns: Dataframe containing values.

strompris.fetch_prices(end_date: date | None = None, days: int = 7, locations: list[str] = ('NO1', 'NO2', 'NO3', 'NO4', 'NO5')) → DataFrame¶

Fetch prices for multiple days and locations into a single DataFrame

Args:

end_date: Last date you want fetched days: Amount of days before last day you want fetched locations: What locations you want to fetch prices for

Returns: Return a dataframe containing all prices.
